node.title: Steve Bannon indicted for contempt of Congress
node.description: Top Trump adviser Steve Bannon failed to comply with a subpoena from the House panel investigating the attack on the Capitol on January 6.
node.content: ["Steve Bannon, who was a top adviser to former President Trump, was indicted today by a federal grand jury for contempt of Congress, as a result of his failure to comply with a subpoena from the House select committee investigating the January 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol, according to a release issued by the Justice Department Friday.", "This is a developing story and will be updated.", "For Breaking News & Analysis Download the Free CBS News app"]
